name: part_007
file: tmp_【#超ゲマズ2_day1】hololive GAMERS fes. 超超超超ゲーマーズ2【チラ見せ】 [DsZz2bIg-Ho]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Opening cheers and high-pitched screams from the hololive Gamers members after their performance.
Individual introductions by each of the four members.
Official start announcement and discussion of attendance numbers and the venue change from last year.
Explanation of the event concept with on-screen text description.
Debuting and showcasing their new matching 3D costumes.
Information regarding photography rules and transitioning to individual aspirations for the event.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで始まりましたー！
subtitles.english: Alright, and so it begins!

subtitles.original: ホロライブゲーマーズです、超超超超ゲーマーズ2です！
subtitles.english: We are hololive GAMERS! This is Cho-Cho-Cho-Cho Gamers 2!

subtitles.original: はい、じゃあちょっとね、自己紹介やっていきますかね。
subtitles.english: Okay, let's go ahead and do some introductions.

subtitles.original: はい、皆様、こんこんきつね！
subtitles.english: Alright everyone, Kon-kon-kitsune!

subtitles.original: こんこんきつねー！
subtitles.english: Kon-kon-kitsune!

subtitles.original: はい、白上フブキです、よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: I'm Shirakami Fubuki, nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: そして、そしてね、まあ1曲目ちょっとね、あの We Are Gamers やらせてもらったんですけども...
subtitles.english: And also, we just performed "We Are Gamers" as our first song...

subtitles.original: もうついにね、4人ということで、いるじゃないですか赤いのが、さあ！
subtitles.english: And now that all four of us are finally here, we have the one in red! Come on!

subtitles.original: はい！
subtitles.english: Yes!

subtitles.original: おおおーい！うちうち、うちだよ！
subtitles.english: Heyyy! It's me, me, it's me!

subtitles.original: 大神ミオです、お待たせいたしましたー！
subtitles.english: I'm Ookami Mio, sorry to keep you waiting!

subtitles.original: あ、お待たせしました、大神ミオの皆様いらっしゃいませ。
subtitles.english: Oh, thanks for waiting. Welcome, everyone, to Ookami Mio.

subtitles.original: はい、続いて！
subtitles.english: Okay, next!

subtitles.original: はい！もぐもぐー？
subtitles.english: Yes! Mogu-mogu...?

subtitles.original: おかゆーん！
subtitles.english: Okayu-n!

subtitles.original: はい、どうも、猫又おかゆです。
subtitles.english: Hi there, I'm Nekomata Okayu.

subtitles.original: 今日はね、最高の思い出を作って、楽しんじゃいましょう。
subtitles.english: Let's make some amazing memories and have a great time today.

subtitles.original: はい、そして！
subtitles.english: Okay, and!

subtitles.original: はい、ゆー？
subtitles.english: Yes, Yu...?

subtitles.original: びびびー！
subtitles.english: Bi-bi-bi!

subtitles.original: 戌神ころねです！
subtitles.english: I'm Inugami Korone!

subtitles.original: みんな今日は大事な日なの、何の日か知ってる？
subtitles.english: Everyone, today is an important day. Do you know what day it is?

subtitles.original: 今日はね、大谷翔平の誕生日！おめでとう！
subtitles.english: Today is Shohei Ohtani's birthday! Congratulations!

subtitles.original: ということで、戌神ころねですよろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Anyway, I'm Inugami Korone. Nice to meet you!

subtitles.original: ということでね、改めまして4人揃って、せーの！
subtitles.english: And so, now that all four of us are here together... one, two!

subtitles.original: ホロライブゲーマーズフェス、超超超超ゲーマーズ2！
subtitles.english: hololive GAMERS fes. Cho-Cho-Cho-Cho Gamers 2!

subtitles.original: その DAY1 がここ、さいたまスーパーアリーナで開幕でございます！
subtitles.english: Day 1 is now officially starting here at Saitama Super Arena!

subtitles.original: なんとですね、あの DAY1, DAY2、用意席とか完売ということで。
subtitles.english: Believe it or not, all the available seats for Day 1 and Day 2 are sold out.

subtitles.original: DAY1, DAY2 ともに約1万5, 6, 7千とかのファンの皆様が今日来てくださってる。
subtitles.english: About 15,000 to 17,000 fans have come to see us for both Day 1 and Day 2.

subtitles.original: すごーい！
subtitles.english: That's amazing!

subtitles.original: 運営さんから DAY1, DAY2 合わせて3.5万人ぐらいですって。
subtitles.english: The staff told me that there are about 35,000 people here over the two days.

subtitles.original: すごすぎるー！
subtitles.english: That's incredible!

subtitles.original: すごいね。ほぼ人間じゃん。
subtitles.english: Wow. That's almost a city's worth of people.

subtitles.original: ほぼ人間だよ！人間以外いないだろ、ここ。
subtitles.english: Of course they are! There's no one but humans here.

subtitles.original: 昨年は国立代々木競技場だったんですけども、今回はさいたまスーパーアリーナということで。
subtitles.english: Last year it was at the Yoyogi National Stadium, but this time we're at Saitama Super Arena.

subtitles.original: すごいですよもう、ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: It's really something else. Thank you so much.

subtitles.original: このイベントはですね、ゲームが大好きな我々ゲーマーズを中心に...
subtitles.english: This event centers around us Gamers, who love video games...

subtitles.original: 超超超超ゲーマーズ2とは...
subtitles.english: What is Cho-Cho-Cho-Cho Gamers 2...?

subtitles.original: 超豪華なゲストと一緒に、様々なゲームタイトルに挑戦したり...
subtitles.english: Where we'll be tackling various game titles with super-luxurious guests...

subtitles.original: ライブパフォーマンスをお届けするプレミアムイベントです！
subtitles.english: And delivering live performances in this premium event!

subtitles.original: 突然出てきて「3Dなの？」って感じなんですけど、4人のお揃いの衣装、お披露目でございます！
subtitles.english: We just popped up, and you might be thinking "Wait, they're in 3D?", but we're debuting our matching costumes!

subtitles.original: かわいいー！
subtitles.english: They're so cute!

subtitles.original: 本当この衣装かわいいから着たいねーって言ってたら、用意してくださいました。
subtitles.english: We were saying how cute these costumes are and how much we wanted to wear them, and they made them for us.

subtitles.original: 夢のようだよねー。
subtitles.english: It's like a dream come true.

subtitles.original: さらに、会場では一部撮影OKなパートがありますので...
subtitles.english: Furthermore, there are parts of the event where photography is permitted in the venue...

subtitles.original: そちらではですね、スマホでお写真を撮っていただけると嬉しいです。
subtitles.english: So we'd love it if you could take some photos with your smartphones during those times.

subtitles.original: ぜひ最後まで一緒に楽しみましょう！
subtitles.english: Let's all have fun together until the very end!

subtitles.original: ということで、1人ずつちょっと意気込みお願いしたいと思います。
subtitles.english: So, I'd like to ask each of you to share your aspirations for today.

subtitles.original: じゃあまずは、ミオから！
subtitles.english: Okay, let's start with Mio!

subtitles.original: はい！えー今年は、去年はね、ちょっとお休みしちゃったんですけど...
subtitles.english: Okay! Well, this year... Since I had to take a break last year...
